main.termino: Congratulations! We've completed the tour. Let's head to the available rooms to get started.

title.title: Welcome to the training room!
title.description: We'll take a look at the system's features! Get ready!

users.title: Who's online?
users.description: You can see the users connected to the room in real-time!

users2.title: I am the leader!
users2.description: The room leader is represented by a crown!

indiv-rec.title: Individual Recommendations
indiv-rec.description: Here, you will see recommendations for you. Only you can see them!

indiv-rec-1.title: Recommend!
indiv-rec-1.description: Use this button to recommend to a user or the entire room!

indiv-rec-2.title: I want it!
indiv-rec-2.description: Add the item to favorites! Everyone will be able to see that you like this song.

indiv-rec-3.title: I want to see more details
indiv-rec-3.description: Find more detailed information about the song. You can also rate it if you want.

group-rec.title: Recommendations for Everyone
group-rec.description: Here, you will see the room recommendations. Everyone can see them!

chat.title: Group Chat
chat.description: You can communicate with the users in the room! Events performed by users will appear, and you can click on them.

history.title: Forgot a song?
history.description: Use this button to view the history of past recommendations.

calificar.title: I feel like discovering something new
calificar.description: Discover new songs and rate them! The system will show you new songs!

indiv-botonrec.title: I want my recommendations
indiv-botonrec.description: Press this button to request recommendations from the system for yourself.

group-botonrec.title: I want recommendations for everyone!
group-botonrec.description: Press this button to request recommendations for everyone. Only available for the room leader!

salas.title: I want to see other rooms
salas.description: Use this button to return to the available rooms.

favourites.title: We love these songs
favourites.description: Check out the users' favorites. The maximum is 7 songs per group. Each user must have at least 1 song in favorites.

flag.title: I'm done
flag.description: Head to the waiting room to finish. You must have rated all the songs in favorites.
